review_content: Oct 2019 Can from Seven-11 in Bangkok, drunk in Zelie's flat. This is a harmless piece of nonsense. More pop than beer.

12 oz. can. Could somebody actually verify that this is really a fruit beer??? It tastes like a alcoholic seltzer water with weak peach juice. Or perhaps a Asian peach candy hint. Massively carbonated like seltzer. Ummmmm… pretty questionable as a beer.
Poured from can clear with no head. Aroma is sweet peach juice. Taste is very sweet peach juice no real carbonation. Interesting. Perhaps best left to use in making cocktails.
355ml can. Pours clear with a small white head. Aroma is peach-flavoured gummy bears. Taste is heavy sweet, artificial peach, sugar. Untappd has it down as a beer, but that’s probably BS.
